about.title: Who We Are
about.presentation: Emergence Consulting Group's vocation is to accompany administrations and companies in finding innovative solutions adapted to their needs. Specialized in economic and statistical studies, and in strategic planning.

founder.title: Our Founder
founder.text: Created in 2001 by Moubarack LO, Economic Statistician Engineer. Graduate of ENSAE-CESD (Paris), IEP Paris, ENA Paris, and Harvard (KSG). Expert for UNDP, World Bank, African Union, and ADB.

vision.title: Our Mission & Vision
vision.content: Our mission is to contribute to making economic and social emergence a reality in developing countries. Our clients' performance is the ultimate barometer of our action.

director.bio: Moubarack LO has contributed to the design of the development strategy of several West African countries. Author of 'Emerging Senegal: Agenda for the Future' and designer of the Synthetic Emerging Index.
